website_summaries.verdict: You will likely laugh out loud at this costume – so long you can deal with your cat's dismay.
pros: Fits best on bigger cats and will create some of your most memorable Halloween photos
While customers note many of their cats don't appreciate the act of putting the costume on, they are fine afterward and ready for their money shots
cons: Read size-related reviews ahead of time to ensure the costume will fit, as it's not universally sized

customer_reviews.title: Funny costume, fake arms
customer_reviews.text: Yo ho ho it’s the pirate life for me. I’m Captain Oliver! Hand over all your mice! As a 4 month old Maine Coon, the medium costume was a bit snug. Better grab a large if you’re a medium sized cat unless you want your crew calling you Fat Cappy Ollie. It’s all fluff I tell you! I dreamed of having real hands alas this outfit has flappy fake arms - they don’t even pick up your tuna! - the humans chuckled. Hat is mega yet flimsy. Human seemed pleased enough with the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Robinson Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for One-Eye Jack
customer_reviews.text: I am blessed with an one-eyed pirate kitty and this little outfit is too cute!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this is by far the best pet costume. My little dog looked great in this, people roared with laughter when they saw her walking towards them. Also good quality. See the picture of my dog pucci
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Pickles

customer_reviews.title: Adorable - watch the sizing
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. A picture is worth a thousand words so i'm just going to leave you here with this. Small was probably a little too short for an 11 lb kitty. Still super cute.
customer_reviews.author: M.C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on even with an impatient cat
customer_reviews.text: Medium fits perfectly for my 10lbs cat. The hat is a tad bit big but I can tighten it even further than it's actual design. Easy to put on even with an impatient cat. Looks very cute
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't want a Pirate Cat for Halloween??
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I had ever put clothes on my cat & let me tell you, this did not disappoint. Poppy is 14lbs & I purchased a medium. It was a little snug on her, but over all fit very well. The hat is a little wonky & would fall off when she walks but overall very good quality. Would recommend to anyone on the fence about purchasing. Quality is good, better than some costumes I've owned. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Super cute & great buy
customer_reviews.text: Cutest dog costume ever!!! We used the sizing info prior to ordering & are glad we did, it fit our dog perfectly. And we were surprised our dog didn’t even mind the costume too much! =) Great buy, thanks amazon!
customer_reviews.author: nemesioucr

customer_reviews.title: Nice pet costume!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this costume in a medium for our year old cat and it fit him nicely. Cute detail with the hook as well. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: RaKayla

customer_reviews.title: Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: If I can figure out how to I'll post a picture of my one eyed cat. He liked it. Now to be honest when I looked at his sister her look said I would loose body parts if I tried it with her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets chuckles from the crowd but pretty flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: This costume was cute and definitely got some laughs. Our kitty was none too amused as her cape kept falling off, but then again, I appreciated that it wasn't choking her. Four stars because it is pretty cheaply made. The "hook" is just a flat piece of felt and it got folded in the package, so it was really bent and floppy. It did its job though.
customer_reviews.author: Evin

customer_reviews.title: Great pirate costume for dogs and cats!
customer_reviews.text: Get this costume. It will bring everyone (except your pet) a ton of laughs. XL fit my golden retriever, who looked hilarious in the costume. Poor guy will do anything for a liver treat, including putting up with costumes for Halloween. Highly recommended, super cute.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: My cat is super docile and small so I thought this one would ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute idea but I have no idea how the person who took this picture got their cat's front paws through the holes. Unless the cat was declawed which is just cruel and wrong! My cat is super docile and small so I thought this one would be perfect. The arm holes are too small and have elastic at the end so when you try to put their feet through their claws get stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Very Small
customer_reviews.text: Followed the sizing guide and ordered the medium. WAY too small for our labradoodle puppy. Not sure even an XL would be big enough based on how small the medium size was. Cute in the pics of other reviews though. Love animal costumes with ‘arms’!
customer_reviews.author: Solar Powered

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: Miss Merry is between a medium and large, depending on where I measured so we went with large. She loved her costume and did not want to stop dancing in it. Her ears are floppy and stayed decently in the hat piece which I was concerned would move alot and bother her. She looks so cute in the costume which is well made and seems durable enough to last a few years without an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Cheshire Cat

customer_reviews.title: Sooo cute!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like about your cat being a pirate? Don't go more than medium for cats. My cat is a little tubby...don't let this new status go to their head, either...if your cat wears this outfit for longer than a photoshoot, it might bring out their sociopathic tendencies even more...
customer_reviews.author: Bugga Mannilow

customer_reviews.title: Size DOWN!!
customer_reviews.text: I followed the measurements & my pup was literally walking OUT of it because it was so big. Should've ordered 1 or 2 sizes smaller. Also couldn't figure out the hat, so I'm sure it was on wrong... it only stayed on long enough for a photo
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Yeaaa no, its fun for the first five minutes.
customer_reviews.text: We put it on her once, and then she hated it, was great for a couple of pics, game over and that was it. Takes about 20 minutes to put on a cat, then it stays on for about 5.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: It is cute. What do you expect for 11.00? Quality is 11.00. Nothing more. Cheap material and sewn like a grade school person did it. Its not like the cat needs to wear it daily. It is worth the money due to the laughs you will get out of watching your cat.
customer_reviews.author: Crizma2U

customer_reviews.title: Super funny and cute pet costume!
customer_reviews.text: Costume is cute and well constructed for a pet outfit. Cat refuses to wear hat...not a product problem... Just a cat problem! Lol
customer_reviews.author: kmpost63

customer_reviews.title: Sweetest pirate ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a sweet one eyed kitty I was fostering, and it did the trick, he got adopted soon after his picture hit the adoption site.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna

customer_reviews.title: It is hard to size guess dog costumes!!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog Hondo weighs only 8 1/2 lbs., but the small was too small, need to make adjustments to the length. Very cute Pirate costume though!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Granger

customer_reviews.title: Cute but runs small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the small for my cats. I tried it on my smallest adult cat and it fit him well. Only complaint is that it is a little snug in the armpit/chest area. I would suggest to go up a size for the average size adult cat. It definitely won't fit my big tomcat.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great costume for small dog
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable! Looks exactly like the picture. I bought a size medium and it fit my 8 lb. yorkie mix perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: Order a few sizes up. I with a Medium after measuring my cats, but it extremely small. She’s not a large cat, but she’s apparently too tall for this and my other cat has no chance of fitting since he’s taller.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: MEh
customer_reviews.text: Cat was not having it. She was easily able to get out of the costume. I can understand the hat not staying on, but the Velcro woulnt stay either. I sort of figured that she'd try and get out of it, but this was just a sad product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meow Like A Pirate!
customer_reviews.text: My cat Decided to go along with it and the other cat liked the cape. Really well made and attention to details. Sturdy fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Schauer

customer_reviews.title: Great Costume
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the XL for our 45lbs pit bull. She has a broad chest we ordered the size up to be safe and it was perfect! We took her to the Sea Witch Festival in Rehoboth, Delaware and she was a hit!!

customer_reviews.title: Great costume, my cat hates it!

product_meta.title: Idepet Funny Pet Clothes Pirate Dog Cat Costume Suit Corsair Dressing up Party Apparel Clothing for Cat Dog Plus Hat
product_meta.description:
Size:MIdepet New Funny Pet Clothes Pirate Dog Cat Costume Suit Corsair Dressing up Party Apparel Clothing for Cat Dog Plus Hat 

Size information: 
Size S:Length_21cm/8.3'';Neck_30cm/11.8'';Cap_34cm/13.4'' 
Size M:Length_32cm/12.6'';Neck_32cm/12.6'' ;Cap_48cm/18.9'' 
Size L:Length_45cm/17.7'';Neck_40cm/15.74'' ;Cap_58cm/22.8'' 
Size XL:Length_51cm/20'';Neck_54cm/21.2'';Cap_78cm/30.7'' 

Please choose size carefully 

*Measuring Your Dog for a Perfect Fit* 

1.How to measure your dog? 

There is a picture to show how to measure your dog above,please check it. 

2.Your baby usually wears size S doesn't mean all size S will fit him/her,please check the size information carefully before you buy. 

You looked at one size chart and found that your dog is a size small. But that doesn't mean he/she is a size small for all the clothes. Different designers and manufacturers use their own size charts. So the measurements given in a size SMALL by manufacturer "A" will be a size XS in manufacturer B's size chart. Don't buy a particular size because that is what you always buy in a pet shop or online store. Always look at the size chart for chest girth and length and confirm the size before you commit to buy. 

3.If any of the measurements are 'between' two sizes, choose the larger size. 

4.If your pet dog is growing up,you can order a bigger size 

5.Take each measurement a bit loosely. 

Take each measurement a bit loosely, so there will be room for your dog to move and breathe, but not too loose. 

Please measure carefully before buying and email us if you have any questions about fit before you bid or make a purchase.
feature_bullets: Made of polyester and non-woven fabric, soft and breathable. This cool pirate costume design turns your pet into a humoristic pirate.
Its worth it for the laughs! Makes a great gift for the holidays and for entertainment.

This designer pet outfit will bring both style and comfort to the little member in your family.Perfect for Everydays Wear, Weekend Parties, Halloween, Christmas, Birthdays, Weddings, Parades, Photo Shoot or Play date.
Note:Please choose the size carefully in the description
Package include: 1 * Pet Cat Pirate Costume Suit with Hat
